== Advanced Feature Testing ==

=== Advanced Audio Codec Support ===

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UbuntuMobile-codec-advanced-audio| Cases]]</nowiki>

* Support MPEG1/MPEG2 layer 3 decode

* Support PCM inside WAV decoder

* Support Dolby Digital/AC3 decode

* Support Advanced Audio Coding (also known as MPEG-2 Part 7, and also MPEG-4 Part 3) decode

* Support BSAC decode (MPEG4 audio codec used in T-DMB)

* MPEG-1 Support

* MPEG-2 Support

=== Advanced Video Codec Support ===

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UbuntuMobile-codec-advanced-video| Cases]]</nowiki>

* Line-21 Support

* Real Video Support

* VC1 Support

* MPEG-4 Support Encode/Decode

* MPEG-4 Part 10 (AVC, H.264)

* MJPEG Support Encode/Decode

* H-263 Support Encode/Decode

* AVS Support

* VP-6 Support

* VP-7 Support

* WMV 7 Support

* WMV 8 Support

* DV Support

* HDV Support

* H.261 Support Encode/Decode

* MPEG TS/PS/ES Support

* AVI splitter Support

* ASF splitter (container for WMV) Support

* MP4 splitter Support

* MP4/3GPP Support

* ASF Support

=== Advanced Wireless Codec Support ===

==== This section has been deferred ====
<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UbuntuMobile-codec-advanced-wireless| Cases]]</nowiki>

* GSM AMR-WB Support

* GSM Full rate (FR) Support

* G.723.1 Support

* G.729 Support

* G.711 Support

* G.726 Support

* G.722 Support

* Voice detection and echo cancellation Support

* GSM-AMR Support

* GSM-AMR WB+ Support

* G.728 Support

=== Kernel ===
<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UbuntuMobile-kernel| Cases]]</nowiki>

* Use kernel version 2.6.21 or later

* Enable tickless idle

=== Bluetooth Profiles ===
<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UbuntuMobile-bluetooth| Cases]]</nowiki>

* Support the Generic Access Profile

* Support the Service Discovery Profile

* Support the Hands Free Profile (HFP) Used by VIOP

* Support the Generic Object Exchange Profile (GOEP)

* Support the Advanced Audio Distribution Profile (A2DP)

* Support the Human Interface Device Profile (HID)

* Support the Headset Profile (HSP)

=== Power and Thermal Management ===
<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UbuntuMobile-power| Cases]]</nowiki>

* ACPI 2.0 support, including support for the new C6 idle state

* Thermal Management Optimizations

=== Boot and Stress ===
<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UbuntuMobile-stress| Cases]]</nowiki>

* Power cycling
 
* Reboot

* Stress

=== Media Infrastructure ===
<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UbuntuMobile-media| Cases]]</nowiki>

* Include the Helix media framework 

* Include GStreamer
